page.title: 20Compton Commercials Ltd. 2
page.content: They{employ}ten people, including one recent school-leaver who has been kept on after training there under the Youth Training Scheme. Another trainee under this scheme has recently left. The empoyees live locally : four in Compton Dundon itself, two in Somerton, others in Glastonbury and Martock. Mr Brereton's son started there last month. It is a small, contented work force. The{site}includes the office and accessory shop, a bungalow and a large open garage (12 x 6 m.approx.) which has a long pit inside and a long ramp alongside. There would seem to be little room to expand in the immediate area.
